body.name: HONGO Portable Monitor 15.6'' 1080P FHD USB-C Portable Laptop Monitors Smart Cover & Dual Speaker, HDMI Computer Display IPS HDR External Gaming Monitor for PC Phone Mac Xbox PS4 Switch

features: [FHD 1080P PORTABLE MONITOR] HONGO using a 15.6'' advanced IPS screen with 178° wide viewing angle, Delivers 1920*1080 breathtaking viewing quality and HDR technology, HONGO portable gaming monitor has excellent color rendering ability, provide you the clearer, smooth, excellent performance in gaming and working. It can effectively reduce blue light radiation damage, no flickering, eye-care, and make it easier to watch for a long time.

[WIDE COMPATIBILITY] HONGO portable monitor for laptop equipped with 2 USB Type-C ports and Mini-HDMI port, easy access to your favorite devices with 1 cable solution, more convenient to connect your laptop, smartphone, PC, PS3, PS4, or Switch etc. It's ideal for extending your screen or playing games on business trip, travel, or home entertainment.
[Plug and Play] There is no need of app and drivers, you only need one USB-C cable toset the portable monitor for its video signal and power to deliver a full HD resolutionviewing.

[ULTRA-SLIM PORTABLE DISPLAY] HONGO USB C portable monitor features a 0.3inch ultra-slim profile, it is easy to slides into your bag, allows you to carry it everywhere, ideal for a simple on-the-go dual-monitor setup or extend your phone screen for movies or games.

[SMART COVER & RELIABLE SERVICE] HONGO portable external monitor can work in both landscape and portrait mode, can be used as a gaming monitor, screen extender for laptop or phone. 2 built-in speakers to play audio, a friendly menu control wheel for setting, Comes with a scratch-proof smart cover made of durable PU leather exterior, doubles as a stand, provides comprehensive protection for this portable computer monitor, and 24/7 professional support team.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ashton Dowling Plugged it in and automatically booted up and showed my screen within a few seconds. I travel a bit for work, so I needed something thin and durable. I could not be happier with this purchase. Julio I tried to connect this monitor to Nintendo Switch during the weekend to play some video games. It comes pretty handy too. I’m going to try the monitor on Raspberry PI. Will update later. Marcie Raad I travel frequently to my mom's to do her taxes. I purchased this monitor to make it easier to do 'paperwork'. I ordered another monitor for my husband to also do his work more easily.

What should I know before buying this monitor? 1-Phones without full-featured Type-C port need an adapter to connect. 2-Laptops without full-featured Type-C port need connected via HDMI & USB C to USB A cable. 3-Not suppot bluetooth, wireless and WIFI connection. No battery. Not touchscreen. What is each cable used for? 1- USB C to USB A cable, only for power supply. 2-USB C to USB C cable, for power supply & video output. 3-MINI HDMI to HDMI cable, only for video output. Note: For HDMI connection, pls use USB C to USB A cable to power up the monitor. Will any USB C to USB C cable work with this display? The USB C to USB C cable should be the USB C 3.1 Version one, which supports video ouput. Or the monitor will fail to be connected. I have charged the monitor for several hours. Why does it fail to turn on and show "no signal"? HONGO NEO 1 portable monitor does not come with a built-in battery. Please connect the monitor with your device (like laptop, PC, Switch etc.) via [USB C to USB C cable] or [MINI HDMI to HDMI cable] & [USB C to USB A cable] for usage. How to connect the monitor with my iPhone? [HONGO NEO 1 - USB C to USB A cable- External Power Supply] [HONGO NEO 1 - MINI HDMI to HDMI cable- Lightning to HDMI Adapter(not included)- iPhone] [Lightning to HDMI Adapter- Apple Charging Cable(not included)- External Power Supply]

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light and handy. Great for travelling
reviews.reviewText: A great product making work a lot easier. The image quality is perfect. The screen is light and easy to carry around. Great if you work with a lot of data and need a second screen to avoid going back and forth between documents.The sad part is that it does not connect with all laptops and phones. Check your output capability on your phone and laptop before even getting a second screen. If it works, this is a great screen. I do see some spots on the screen when it is about to turn off but that hasn't affected my work. Customer service was top notch too! The screen wasn't working with my phone. I got help right away. They checked with their tech team and helped me check my phone output. Sadly my phone doesn't have the output capability. Would suggest this to a friend or anyone looking for a phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable Powerhouse - HONGO 15.6'' Portable Monitor Transforms Any Space
reviews.reviewText: I recently added the HONGO 15.6'' Portable Monitor to my tech arsenal, and it has quickly become an indispensable part of my daily routine. Here's why I'm thoroughly impressed:Crisp and Clear Display:The visual clarity of this portable monitor is outstanding. The 15.6-inch screen provides ample real estate for a variety of tasks, from work presentations to immersive movie nights. The colors are vibrant, and the details are sharp, making every visual experience a delight.Exceptional Portability:True to its name, the HONGO Portable Monitor lives up to its promise of portability. It's incredibly slim and lightweight, making it the perfect companion for on-the-go professionals or anyone who needs a secondary screen for their laptop. It effortlessly slips into my bag, transforming any space into a productive workstation.Versatile Connectivity:The range of connectivity options is impressive. Whether I'm using HDMI, USB-C, or Mini DisplayPort, the HONGO monitor seamlessly integrates with various devices. The plug-and-play functionality ensures a hassle-free setup, allowing me to focus on my work or entertainment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best one I have used so far
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot for work this is my favorite portable monitor so far.For work with my laptop it is easy to transport has a better case and stand then several others I have tried. Would like it to be more sturdy when stood up but works well. Brightness has never been an issue. So of the others I tired were not very bright this is probably just as bright as my laptop screen.I've used it hooked up to a Nintendo switch while traveling before and it looked great and worked great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good overall portable monitor
reviews.reviewText: This is a preliminary review, but as long as it doesn't fail or wow me in any other ways, I won't add anything more.Use: I needed a portable monitor to pair with my 2021 Asus Zephyrus G15 for work. I'm an IT Engineer and use multi-monitors everywhere I go. I find being limited to my laptop's monitor very confining.Initial appearance: The monitor is clean without any tacky logos. That's a real plus. The monitor doesn't appear to flex much, and ships with a cover / stand which is necessary for travel. Thin bezels on all sides look attractive. The 3 levels of tilt from the cover are good. I prefer the middle level.Build quality: It doesn't seem fully metal like the description, but build quality seems good. The monitor and frame look good and are assembled without noticeable issues. The cover is plastic material that seems a little thin, but should stand up to stains well. It has a magnetic clasp for holding it shut. The controls on the right side feel wimpy, so I'll be careful with them. The clickwheel, while easy to use, feels especially weak.Picture quality: Good, not sure if it's fully color accurate, but it seems close. It's an IPS display that's listed as 400 nits brightness, but I'd estimate it is closer to 300nits at top backlight level, similar to my G15's ~335 max, but not as bright. I'd recommend avoiding UltraHDR mode. It doesn't appear to work over a singular USB-C cable. Resolution is 1920x1080, 60hz. It supports slower hertz settings, but I wouldn't recommend it. Text is crisp and easy to read. I immediately maxed out the backlight to 10/10.Connectivity: You have the choice of micro HDMI to HDMI or USB-C to USB-C via displayport. If your laptop has a DP logo on the port, it should work, and if it provides enough power over USB-C, it should all work on one cable. That's a major plus for me. There's also another USB-C port for the power brick and a micro USB I'm assuming for power as well, but no included cable. Powering the monitor off my laptop forces it to use the built-in GPU, a 3070 mobile, which causes the whole setup to drain power much faster than it would otherwise. I'd recommend using your power brick or a charger with your laptop, otherwise you'll have half as much battery as you'd normally be used to.Overall: I like it. It's disappointing that it's only ~300 nits brightness since it was advertised at 400, but I can live with it. The USB-C to DP connection can be a little squirrelly and might take some repeated unplugging to fix, but it seems to work well enough. I like the build quality, the picture quality and the weight. It's not a great choice for gamers with only 60hz, but it's a good fit for professionals on the go who need a second monitor.What's in the box?1x portable monitor1x micro HDMI to HDMI cable, ~4 foot (for display only)1x USB-C to USB-C cable, ~4 foot (for power and display)1x USB-C to USB-A cable, ~4 foot (for power only)1x power brick, meant to be used with the USB-C to USB-A cable if using the HDMI cable or your laptop's USB power doesn't provide enough power1x instruction manual, simple but generally useful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price/performance and solid feature set
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought this monitor on sale and I am very happy with the features and performance that you get for the price. I tried connecting the monitor via HDMI and via USB-C to USB-C cable. Everything worked well. Initially it took me awhile to get the monitor working as a second display via USB-C, but that was because I used my own USB-C to USB-C cable instead of the one that comes with the monitor. Once I used the provided USB-C to USB-C cable everything worked like clockwork. I used the monitor with a Samsung Galaxy S21+, and iPad Pro and two different Lenovo Thinkpad X1 Tablet (one of them is an older Gen 1). The screen was flicker free and I used it at the full 1920x1080 resolution. Be aware, that If there is no data connection (via HDMI or USB-C) the monitor just cycles through different colors and you can't get the set-up menu of the monitor. but once you get a monitor picture you can bring-up the settings menu. The picture is sharp, but the colors are not quite as vivid and bright as in a high-end monitor. However, for the price, I think you get great value. I also like that you can plug your USB-C [laptop] power supply into one of the two USB-C ports of the monitor and then connect & power your laptop / phone / tablet via the second USB-C port using the USB-C to USB-C cable. That keeps your desk nice and clutter free from too many cables. Be aware that this model does not have a touchscreen. If you want one, then you have to go with a model that's a quite a bit pricier.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good, Light, Thin Monitor. Supports Power Passthrough!
reviews.reviewText: The big thing I was concerned about was it power passthrough supported laptops. This is critical if you want to charge your laptop while using the monitor and only have one USB C port free. The documentation only talks about using it to power your phone.Yes! You can plug your laptop power adapter into the power-in and it will charge your laptop. You can also use a USB C power bank to get extended life with no mains power.On top of that, this monitor far exceeds the documentation. The monitor supports HDR, DCR and a wide variety of adjustments and has quite acceptable colour quality. The saturation is a little low for my taste but very much on par with most laptops and consumer monitors.The documentation is weak, and I have found no on-line sources for more thorough documentation such as advanced settings a connection options (including power passthrough). It comes with a screen protector with no instructions or tools to install. After a couple of attempts, it ended in the recycling.This monitor is so thin and light that the laptop AND the monitor in it's protective cover fits nicely in my laptop sleeve. This was a great purchase to allow me to do serious work when travelling.

Screen quality is clear, not too bright and gets the work done. Though the complimentary/free screen protector bubbles up easily when you apply it on the screen so I’ll probably just remove it eventually.As expected, the screen isn’t as bright as the more expensive brands and the speaker volume isn’t loud, but I’m still giving this product 5 stars as I didn’t buy this product for these reasons.I bought this device a second screen for my dated 2013 MacBook Air and my other gaming laptop for University this coming fall and I’m pretty satisfied with the quality.I really appreciate the effort to make the packaging feel premium considering how affordable the discounted retail price point is.

For the money I paid it's a pretty good value as a secondary monitor for my laptop.Pros:You can power this monitor with only the USB-C cable. Display and power in one convenient cable.It comes with all the cables you'll need (if you can't do the above)Really affordableBuilt in speakersCons:Picture looks washed out I tried to adjust it but that comes to my second conOn screen control buttons are horrible.If you go into the screen menu and try to adjust brightness, good luck. It seems to be locked out by some other setting and I have yet to find that setting. Plainly speaking the instructions and screen menu controls are hot trash. All they had to do was include one more button with the other three and they could have greatly simplified setting the monitor up in the controls. As it is now you have to press the "menu" button and then press and hold it to get into a menu...or is that press it a second time. In any case, it's a foolish way of doing things and an addition button for "enter" would have made things so much easier.So I'll keep on trying to figure out how to reduce that washed out look on the screen, I guess.As an added bonus it has built in speakers but they are only what I would call adequate. But if your laptop speakers are nonfunctional it would do the trick for you.Overall though it's a really good screen for what it costs and, if you want a secondary monitor for your laptop, it does the trick.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works fine until it DIES in 8 months.
reviews.reviewText: Broke - less than a year old. This monitor stopped working right after the product support window closed. I am pretty gentle on my computer gear and don’t even use this monitor very often.. in spite of gentle use, it’s completely DEAD.While it was working, it was functional and felt decently built. It used up a ton of power though and when it was plugged into my laptop for power it would drain the battery a lot faster than it should have.For the price, I could have bought something that was a better picture quality and actually survived more than a year of use. This monitor only lasted like 8 months. Terrible. I’m so mad

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use/ great image /thin light
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Very happy with this portable monitor. Super easy to connect to my laptop and cell phone with just one type-c cable it comes with.The IPS screen is beautiful and great image quality, love it.This monitor is so thin and light, paired with my Huawei cell phone, make it a great entertaining unit while on the road, especially the monitor has its own speakers, works perfectly when connecting to phone to watch media. The great part is while watching media on the portable monitor, you can still use the phone for anything else, amazing.The monitor also allows me to do serious work from home as second monitor when using with my Thinkpad laptop.A great purchase overall.
